title: RootsMagic 11 Database Schema
description: SQLite database schema for RootsMagic 11 genealogy software

OwnerType.description: 0 = Person (Address of Person Fact from Edit Person Window), 1 = Family (Address of Spouse / Parents from Edit Person Window), 3 = Source (Repository), 6 = Task  (Address or Repository)

OwnerID.description: Link based on OwnerType: 0 = PersonTable.PersonID, 1 = FamilyTable.FamilyID, 3 = SourceTable.SourceID, 6 = TaskTable.TaskID

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

Name.description: Name, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Street1.description: Street address [first line], from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Street2.description: Street address [second line], from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

City.description: City, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

State.description: State, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Zip.description: Postal Code, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Country.description: Country, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Phone1.description: Phone, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Phone2.description: Cell phone, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Fax.description: Fax, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Email.description: Email, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

URL.description: Website, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.

Note.description: Note, from Edit Address pane or Edit Repository pane.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

rmID.description: Link based on LinkType: 0 = PersonTable.PersonID,  4 = CitationTable.CitationID,  11 = MultiMediaTable.MediaID

anID.description: Person = [d]{12}:[d]{4}:[d]{9} - e.g.: 121212121212:1030:123456789, Citation, origin RM = [d]:9000:[d] (length varies), Citation, origin Ancestry = [d]:[d]  Media = Ancestry assigned ID (matches filename for media downloaded from Ancestry)

Modified.description: For LinkType=0 (Person): 0 = No modification detected or 'Mark as not changed' button has been selected in Treeshare, 1 = Change identified in RM db or in Ancestry via Treeshare notification. Person’s status appears as changed in Treeshare.

anVersion.description: Hex code where LinkType=0 (Person),  Otherwise NULL

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

RelFather.description: Relationship to Father as defined in Parents section of Edit Person:  0 = Birth, 1 = Adopted,  2 = Step, 3 = Foster, 4 = Related, 5 = Guardian, 6 = Sealed, 7 = Unknown

RelMother.description: Relationship to Mother as defined in Parents section of Edit Person:  (Values same as RelFather)

ChildOrder.description: When number of Children=1: 0 = Child added to family with Add Father or Add Mother action, 1000 = Child added to family with Add Child action; Else, once number of Children >1 value matches order in Family view.

ProofFather.description: Set by Proof listbox in Parents pane of Edit Persons.  0 - Blank,  1 - Proven,  2 - Disproven,  3 - Disputed

ProofMother.description: Set by Proof listbox in Parents pane of Edit Persons.  0 - Blank,  1 - Proven,  2 - Disproven,  3 - Disputed

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

OwnerType.description: 0 = Person,  1 = Family,  2 = Event,  6 = Task,  7 = Name, 19 = Association

OwnerID.description: Link to Primary Key of table based on OwnerType:  0 = PersonTable.PersonID,  1 = FamilyTable.FamilyID,  2 = EventTable.EventID,  6 = TaskTable.TaskID,  7 = NameTable.NameID,  19 = FanTable.FanID

SortOrder.description: Not Implemented: Null = Legacy data, 0 =  New table entry

Quality.description: 3-Character Quality of this information:  1st = (Info): P = Primary, S = Secondary,~ = Don't know  2nd = (Evidence): D = Direct, I = Indirect, N = Negative, ~ = Don't know  3rd = (Source): O = Original, X = Derivative, ~ = Don't know

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

RecType.description: Record Type: 1 = Database Configuration settings 3 = Custom Report settings, from Publish menu 4 =  5 = Standard Report settings, from Publish menu 6 = HTML Website settings, from Publish menu 7 = Problem Options, from General Settings menu or Problem Search 9 = Book settings, from Publish menu

Title.description: Title - See Row 5 of ConfigTable Tab

DataRec.description: Data Record - See Row 40 of ConfigTable Tab

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

OwnerID.description: Link based on OwnerType: 0 = PersonID in PersonTable, 1 =  FamilyID in FamilyTable

FamilyID.description: Link based on OwnerType: 0 = not applicable or not assigned to event, Else = FamilyID in FamilyTable (Set via Parents listbox in Edit Person Fact pane for events such as Adoption or LDS Seal to Parents)

PlaceID.description: 0 if no Place has been assigned to event,  else PlaceID in PlaceTable

SiteID.description: 0 if no Place Details assigned to event,  else PlaceID (of Place Details) in PlaceTable

examples: Position coded string or free text

SortDate.description: Number representing a user entered date that forces an event into a position relative to other events in lists sorted on the Date field.

IsPrimary.description: Primary checkbox in Edit Person Fact pane: 0 = Not checked (default), 1 = Checked. (Used to suppress from reports other conflicting facts of the same type.)

IsPrivate.description: Private checkbox in Edit Person Fact pane: 0 = Not checked (default), 1 = Checked. (Used to optionally suppress from reports events that are considered “private”.)

Proof.description: Proof listbox in Edit Person Fact pane: 0 = Blank,  1 = Proven,  2 = Proven False,  3 = Disputed

Status.description: 0 (default), Else = status of LDS events: e.g. 1-Submitted, 8-DNS, 12-Cleared

Sentence.description: Customised sentence for this event.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

Details.description: Content of Description field in Edit Person Fact pane

Note.description: Content of Note in Edit Person Fact Pane.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

ExclusionType.description: Exclusion Type: 1 = Person member of \Not a duplicate list\, from Merge Duplicates tool, 2 = Person member of \Not a problem list\, from Problem List tool

ID1.description: Identification Number 1, based on ExclusionType: 1 = PersonTable.PersonID of Person 1 from potential merge, 2 = PersonTable.PersonID of person marked in \Not a problem list\

ID2.description: Identification Number 2, based on ExclusionType: 1 = PersonTable.PersonID of Person 2 from potential merge,  2 = Problem filter matched (

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

FactTypeID.description: Fact Type Identification Number: Built-in < 1000,  User-defined > = 1000

Name.description: Name, from Edit Fact Type window

Abbrev.description: Abbreviation, from Edit Fact Type window

GedcomTag.description: GEDCOM Tag = \EVEN\ for some built-in and all user defined Fact Types

UseValue.description: \Use description field\ checkbox, from Edit Fact Type window: 0 = No (unchecked) 1 = Yes (checked)

UseDate.description: \Use date field\ checkbox, from Edit Fact Type window: 0 = No (unchecked) 1 = Yes (checked)

UsePlace.description: \Use place field\ checkbox, from Edit Fact Type window: 0 = No (unchecked) 1 = Yes (checked)

Sentence.description: Sentence template for this role, from Edit Role Type window for Role name of Principal. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

Flags.description: 6-bit position-coded number for Include settings for Fact Type.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

fsID.description: FamilySearch ID from FamilySearch Family Tree connection

Modified.description: 0 = Default, 1 = Mismatch exists between FamilySearch and RM record details (Event date, place, etc) Note: Modified flag resets to \0\ after any data for this person is shared via the FS API, even if data mismatches still exist.

Status.description: 0 = Default, Person Record initially created in RM db 4 = Person Record initially imported from FamilySearch

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

FatherID.description: Links to PersonID in the PersonTable

MotherID.description: Links to PersonID in the PersonTable

ChildID.description: Links to PersonTable.PersonID of Child last active as the root person in Pedigree view, 0 = No Children in family or no child displayed as root in Pedigree view.

HusbOrder.description: Husband Order, from People View, Edit Menu, Rearrange Spouses: 0 if never rearranged

WifeOrder.description: Wife Order, from People View, Edit Menu, Rearrange Spouses: 0 if never rearranged

Proof.description: Proof, from Spouse Fact in Edit Person window: 0 = [blank],  1 = Proven,  2 = Disproven,  3 = Disputed

FatherLabel.description: Father Label, from Spouse Fact in Edit Person window: 0 = Father 1 = Husband 2 = Partner 99 = Other

MotherLabel.description: Mother Label, from Spouse Fact in Edit Person window: 0 = Mother 1 = Wife 2 = Partner 99 = Other

FatherLabelStr.description: Spouse Fact, from Edit Person window: User defined text when FatherLabel=99

MotherLabelStr.description: Spouse Fact, from Edit Person window: User defined text when MotherLabel=99

Note.description: Note for Spouse Fact, from Edit Person window: User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

GroupID.description: 1 = Results of Person Search from Search menu, 2 = Results of Person Search - Advanced from Search menu, >1000 = Group (Simple or Rules based) Note: a temporary group is created whenever the basic or advanced Person Search options are run from the Search Menu. The group is automatically deleted when the search results are cleared or a subsequent search is run.

StartID.description: Links to PersonTable.PersonID, Starting Number of consecutively-numbered PersonIDs

EndID.description: Links to PersonTable.PersonID, Ending Number of consecutively-numbered PersonIDs

UTCModDate.description: Not implemented

MediaID.description: Media Identification Number, links to MediaID of MultimediaTable

OwnerType.description: Owner Type: 0 = Person (Person Fact),  1 = Family (Spouse or Parents Fact) 2 = Event,  3 = Source,  4 = Citation,  5 = Place, 6 = Task, 7 = Name (Primary or Alternate), 14 = Place Details, 19 = Association

OwnerID.description: Link based on OwnerType: 0 = PersonTable.PersonID,  1 = FamilyTable.FamilyID, 2 = EventTable.EventID, 3 = SourceTable.SourceID, 4 = CitationTable.CitationID, 5 = PlaceTable.PlaceID, 6 = TaskTable.TaskID 7 =  NameTable.NameID, 14 = PlaceTable.PlaceID, 19 = FanTable.FanID

IsPrimary.description: Primary Photo checkbox, from the Edit Media pane: 0 = Not checked (default), 1 = Checked. (Determines image displayed in reports, the Pedigree view, and the People Side View pane for the selected person.)

Include1.description: Include in Scrapbook, from the Edit Media pane: 0 = Do Not Include (unchecked) 1 = Include (checked)

SortOrder.description: Sort Order, from Media Album view in Edit Person window: 0 = (Default) Order by MediaLinkTable.LinkID, Else, order set via the Rearrange window of Person's Media Album.  Note:  The default sort order for media links is the order in which the media links are added (MediaLinkTable.LinkiD). Within a fixed MediaLinkTable.OwnerType and MediaLinkTable.OwnerID, the sort order is effectively \ORDER BY MediaLinkTable.SortOrder, MediaLinkTable.LinkID\. Because when SortOrder defaults to zero, the actual sort order defaults to LinkID.

Comments.description: Media Tag Comment, from Add Media Tag window. (Select Tags from Edit Media pane of Media window, then add a new tag.)

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

MediaType.description: Media Type, from Add Media Item screen  1 = Image,  2 = File,  3 = Sound,  4 = Video

MediaPath.description: Relative file path of Media File, extracted from Filename field in Add Media window or Edit Media pane. The first character in the MediaPath may be a symbol: ? = Media Folder defined in Folder Settings window, ~ = User's home directory defined by the Operating System * = Folder containing the RM Database

MediaFile.description: File name, extracted from Filename field in Add Media window or Edit Media pane

Caption.description: Caption, from Add Media window or Edit Media pane

RefNumber.description: Reference Number, from Add Media window or Edit Media pane

examples: Position coded string or free text

Description.description: Description, from Add Media window or Edit Media pane.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

OwnerID.description: Link to PersonTable.PersonID (aka Record Identification Number - RIN).   A single OwnerID can have multiple NameID's for Alternate Names.

Prefix.description: Name prefix, e.g., Dr., Rev., Lord, Lady...

Suffix.description: Name suffix, e.g., Jr., Sr., III, ...

NameType.description: 0 - Null 1 - AKA 2 - Birth 3 - Immigrant 4 - Maiden 5 - Married 6 - Nickname 7 - Other Spelling

examples: Position coded string or free text

SortDate.description: Sort Date for Name Fact, from Edit Person window: The Sort Date forces the Name fact into a position relative to other facts in the Edit Person window . (Blank Date = 9223372036854775807)

IsPrimary.description: 1 = Name is listed in the Primary Name fact, 0 = Alternate Name, Editable by selecting the Primary Checkbox in an Alternate Name fact.

IsPrivate.description: Private checkbox in Edit Person Alternate Name Fact edit pane:   0 = NOT selected (default),  1 = Selected.  Used to optionally suppress from reports events that are considered “private”.

Proof.description: Set by Proof listbox in Edit Person Name Fact edit pane.  0 = Blank (default),  1 = Proven,  2 = Disproven, 3 = Disputed

Sentence.description: Customized sentence template for this Alternate Name,  entered in Edit Person Alternate Name Customize Sentence window.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

Note.description: Note for Name Fact, from Edit Person window: User Interface upports line breaks and formatting tags.

BirthYear.description: Year extracted from EventTable.Date for Birth FactType for Person

DeathYear.description: Year extracted from EventTable.Date for Death FactType for Person

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

PlaceType.description: 0 = Place, from Edit Person screen for a fact,  1 = LDS Temples, Built-In,  2 = Place details, from Edit Person screen for a fact

Name.description: Place Name from Edit Place pane of Places window or the Fact Edit pane of Edit Person window (PlaceType = 0), Place Name, pre-defined (PlaceType = 1),  Place Detail Name from Edit Place Detail pane of Places window or the Fact Edit pane of Edit Person window (PlaceType = 2)  Note: Place names (or Place details) can only be modified from the Places Menu window. Edits made from the Edit Person window add new Places or Place Details.

Abbrev.description: Abbreviated place name, from Edit Place pane of Places window (PlaceType = 0 and 2),  Pre-defined (PlaceType = 1)

Normalized.description: Standardized place name from Edit Place pane of Places window (PlaceType = 0 and 2),  Pre-defined (PlaceType = 1)

Latitude.description: Latitude in decimal degrees stored as an integer (ie multiplied by 1e7). Pre-defined for LDS Temples (PlaceType=1), Else User Defined via Edit Place or Edit Place Details pane of Places window.

Longitude.description: Longitude in decimal degrees stored as an integer (ie multiplied by 1e7). Pre-defined for LDS Temples (PlaceType=1), Else User Defined via Edit Place or Edit Place Details pane of Places window.

MasterID.description: 0 for PlaceType = 0,1 PlaceID of Place, for PlaceType = 2 (Place Detail)

Note.description: Place note, from Edit screen for PlaceType = 0 and 2.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

Reverse.description: Calculated field containing the reverse order of the comma-delimeted fields in the PlaceTable.Name column  Note: This field is automatically updated whenever the Place Name (or Place Details) value is modified from the Places Menu window. Edits made from the Edit Person window add new Places or Place Details.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

RoleID.description: RoleIDs = 1 – 58  are pre-defined in built-in Fact Types

RoleName.description: Role name, from Edit Role Type window. Displays with fact in Edit Person window when a fact is shared.

EventType.description: Event Type, links to FactTypeID in FactTypeTable

Sentence.description: Sentence template for this role, from Edit Fact Type/Edit Role Type screen. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

Name.description: Source Name, from Edit Source pane or Edit Citation pane

RefNumber.description: Source Ref#, from Edit Source pane or Edit Citation pane

ActualText.description: Source Text, from Edit Source pane or Edit Citation pane

Comments.description: Source Comment,  from Edit Source pane or Edit Citation pane

TemplateID.description: Template Identification Number: 0 = Free-Form,  Else, links to TemplateID in SourceTemplateTable

Fields.description: Master Source Field \Names\  (from Source template) and \Values\ (from Edit Source pane).  For Free-Form sources, XML contains  Footnote, Short Footnote, and Bibliography plus associated values.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

TemplateID.description: Template Identification Number: 1 - 439 = Built-In (See Source Template window),  10,000+ = User-Defined

Name.description: Template Name, from Source Template window. Only user-defined templates are editable.

Description.description: Description Details, from Source Template Description window. Only user-defined templates are editable.

Favorite.description: 0 = Not a Favorite (Default), 1 = Template starred as Favorite from Select Source Type screen of Add Source window

Category.description: Category Details, from Source Template Description window. Only user-defined templates are editable.

Footnote.description: Footnote Template, from Source Templates window. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags but only user-defined templates are editable.

ShortFootnote.description: Short Footnote Template, from Source Template window. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags but only user-defined templates are editable.

Bibliography.description: Bibliography Template, from Source Template window. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags but only user-defined templates are editable.

FieldDefs.description: From Source Template Field window: Field Name, Display Name, Field Type, Brief hint, Long hint, and True/False flag to identify whether the field is located in the source or citation.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

TagValue.description: If TagValue >1000, links to GroupTable.GroupID Else, incremental placeholder for Task Folders.

TagName.description: Name of Group or Task Folder

Description.description: Description of Task Folder, Blank for Groups.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

OwnerType.description: 0 = Person, 1 = Family, 2 = Event, 5 = Place,  7 = Name,  14 = Place Detail,  18 = Folder,  19 = Association

OwnerID.description: Link based on OwnerType: 0 = PersonTable.PersonID, 1 = FamilyTable.FamilyID, 2 = EventTable.Eventid, 5 = PlaceTable.PlaceID, 7 = NameTable.NameID, 14 = PlaceTable.PlaceID, 18 = TagTable.TagID, 19 = FanTable.FanID

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

TaskType.description: From Add Task window or Edit Task pane: 0 = Blank, 1 = Research,  2 = ToDo,  3 = Correspondence

RefNumber.description: Reference #, from Add Task window or Edit Task pane.

Name.description: Name, from Add Task window or Edit Task pane.

Status.description: Status, From Add Task window or Edit Task pane: 0 = New, 1 = In Progress, 2 = Completed, 3 = On hold, 4 = Problem, 5 = Cancelled

Priority.description: From Add Task window or Edit Task pane: 0 = Priority 1 (Highest), 1 = Priority 2 (Very High), 2 = Priority 3 (High), 3 = Priority 4 (Med high), 4 = Priority 5 (Medium), 5 = Priority 6 (Med low), 6 = Priority 7 (Low), 7= Priority 8 (Very Low)

Date1.description: Start Date, from Edit Task screen. [See Date sheet for additional details.]
examples: Position coded string or free text

Date2.description: Last Edit Date, from Edit Task screen. [See Date sheet for additional details.]
examples: Position coded string or free text

Date3.description: End Date, from Edit Task screen. [See Date sheet for additional details.]
examples: Position coded string or free text

Filename.description: File name and path, from Add Task window or Edit Task pane.

Details.description: Details, from Add Task window or Edit Task pane.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

Results.description: Results, from Add Task window or Edit Task pane.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

Exclude.description: From Filter Tasks window: 0 = Display Task in list (default), 1= Filter from Task list

OwnerType.description: Owner Type: 3 = Source, 4 = Citation, 5 = Place, 6 = Task, 14 = Place Details

OwnerID.description: Owner Identification, link based on OwnerType: 3 = SourceTable.SourceID, 4 = CitationTable.CitationID,  5 = PlaceTable.PlaceID, 6 = Tasktable.TaskID, 14 = PlaceTable.PlaceID

Name.description: Name, from Edit Web Tag window

URL.description: URL, from Edit Web Tag window

Note.description: Note, from Edit Web Tag window.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

EventID.description: Event Identification Number, linking to EventID of EventTable

PersonID.description: Person that the fact has been shared with: 0 = This person is NOT in RM database, Else, PersonTable.PersonID

Role.description: Role, from Edit shared event screen, Links to RoleID in RoleTable

Sentence.description: From Edit Person window of person that the fact has been shared with: Blank (Default) = Role Sentence not customized, Else, customized sentence

Note.description: Note, from Edit Witness pane of Edit Person window for person that the fact has been shared with.  User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

Given.description: From Edit Witness pane of Edit Person window for person that the fact has been shared with: Blank (Default) = Person is in RM database, Else, First name of person

Surname.description: From Edit Witness pane of Edit Person window for person that the fact has been shared with: Blank (Default) = Person is in RM database, Else, Last name of person

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

Name.description: Association Type, based on FANTypeID: 1 = Friends 2 = Neighbors  3 = Employment  4 = Education  5 = Enslavement  6 = Household  7 = Classmates  8 = Coworkers  9 = Apprenticeship  10 = Godparent  11 = Relative  12 = DNA Match  13 = Medical  14 = Grave neighbors  15 = Rental  999 = Associates

Role1.description: Role 1 and Role2 Names, based on FANTypeID: 1 = Friend / Friend  2 = Neighbor / Neighbor  3 = Employer / Employee  4 = Teacher / Student  5 = Enslaver / Enslaved person  6 = Household member / Household member  7 = Classmate / Classmate  8 = Coworker / Coworker  9 = Master / Apprentice  10 = Godparent / Godchild  11 = Relative / Relative  12 = DNA match / DNA match  13 = Doctor / Patient  14 = Burial / Burial  15 = Landlord / Tenant  999 = Associate / Associate

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

FanID.description: RecordID for Friends, Associations, Neighbours links in support of the Association fact type.

ID1.description: Link to PersonTable.PersonID for node1 of association

ID2.description: Link to PersonTable.PersonID for node2 of association

PlaceID.description: 0 = Place Blank, Else, link to PlaceTable.PlaceID for PlaceType=0

SiteID.description: 0 = Place Blank, Else, link to PlaceTable.PlaceID for PlaceType=2

Date.description: Date, from Associations. [See Date sheet for additional details.]
examples: Position coded string or free text

SortDate.description: Number representing a user entered date that forces an event into a position relative to other events in lists sorted on the Date field.

Description.description: Description, from Association pane of Edit Person window.

Note.description: Note, from Association pane of Edit Person window. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

RecType.description: 3 = Saved Task Filter, 4 = Saved Search, 5 = Saved Group

OwnerID.description: Link based on RecType: 1 = \0\ (not used), 2 = GroupTable.GroupID, 3 = \0\ (not used)

Title.description: Saved Name of Search or Group

DataRec.description: Saved Criteria for Search or Group

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

Comments.description: Detail Comment from Edit Citation pane. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

ActualText.description: Research Note from Edit Citation pane. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

RefNumber.description: Detail Ref# from Edit Citation pane.

Footnote.description: Value from Customize Footnote window, overrides sentence template output. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

ShortFootnote.description: Value from Customize Footnote window, overrides sentence template output. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

Bibliography.description: Value from Customize Footnote window, overrides sentence template output. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

Fields.description: Citation Detail field “Names” (from Source template) and “Values” (from Edit Citation pane)

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

CitationName.description: If left blank, field value is auto generated as the concatenation of all Citation Detail fields separated by semi-colons.

UniqueID.description: Unique Identification Number assigned to person

ParentID.description: 0 = No Parents, Any other value = FamilyTable.FamilyID If person has more than 1 set of parents, then value changes based on FamilyID of parent couple last displayed in Pedigree, Family, or Descendent View.

SpouseID.description: 0 = No Spouse, Any other value = FamilyTable.FamilyID If person has more than 1 spouse, then value changes based on FamilyID of the couple last displayed in Pedigree, Family, or Descendent View.

Color.description: Set Color for Color Set 1, from Color Coding window: 0 = None,  1 = Red,  2 = Lime,  3 = Blue,  4 = Pink, 5 = Yellow,  6 = Aqua,  7 = Silver,  8 = Maroon,  9 = Green,  10 = Navy,  11 = Purple,  12 = Brown,  13 = Teal,  14 = Grey, 15 = Apricot, 16 = Lemon, 17 = Chatreuse, 18 = Mint, 19 = Azure, 20 = Mauve, 21 = Orange, 22 = Turquoise, 23 = Khaki, 24 = Olive, 25 = Forest, 26 = Aubergine, 27 = Slate

Color1.description: Color Set 2, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Color2.description: Color Set 3, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Color3.description: Color Set 4, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Color4.description: Color Set 5, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Color5.description: Color Set 6, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Color6.description: Color Set 7, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Color7.description: Color Set 8, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Color8.description: Color Set 9, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Color9.description: Color Set 10, from Color Coding window: See PersonTable.Color for values

Relate1.description: Relate1, number of generations from this person to Most Recent Common Ancestor with the person chosen via Tools > Set Relationships. Relate1&2 work in combinaton with PersonTable.Flags to describe the relationship between this person and the person defined in Tools>Set Relationships.

Relate2.description: Relate2, number of generations from the person chosen via Tools > Set Relationships to the Most Recent Common Ancestor with this person.

Flags.description: Prefix description added to Set Relationship display as defined by Relate1/Relate2 calculation: 0 = No prefix descriptor, 1 = \Half\, 2 = \Spouse of\ male blood relation (ie display uses \Father, Uncle, Cousin\), 3 = \Spouse of half\ male blood relation (ie display uses \Father, Uncle, Cousin\), 6 = \Spouse of\ female blood relation (ie display uses  \Mother, Aunt, Cousin\), 7 = \Spouse of half\ female blood relation (ie display uses  \Mother, Aunt, Cousin\), 10 = \Spouse of\ blood relation where sex is unknown (ie display uses \Mother/Father, Aunt/Uncle, Cousin\)

Living.description: Living, from Edit Person window: 0 = Deceased,  1 = Living

Bookmark.description: Bookmark, from Sidebar Bookmarks view: 0 = Not Bookmarked, 1 = Bookmarked

Note.description: Note field from Edit Person screen, Person Fact. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

ID1.description: Person 1, from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.  Links to PersonTable.PersonID.

ID2.description: Person 2, from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.  Links to PersonTable.PersonID.

Label1.description: Label 1, from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.

Label2.description: Label 2, from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.

DNAProvider.description: Provider, from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window: 1 = 23andMe, 2 = Ancestry, 3 = Family Tree DNA, 4 = Living DNA, 5 = My Heritage, 6 = GEDmatch, 998 = Unknown, 999 = Other

SharedCM.description: Shared Centimorgans (cM), from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.

SharedPercent.description: Shared Percentage, from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.

LargeSeg.description: Largest Segment (cM), from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.

SharedSegs.description: Shared Segments, from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.

examples: Position coded string or free text

Relate1.description: Relate1, the number of generations between Person 1 (DNATable.ID1) and the Most Recent Common Ancestor (DNATable.CommonAnc). Relate1 and Relate2, taken together with DNATable.CommonAncType, calculate the relationship between the shared DNA Match.

Relate2.description: Relate2, the number of generations between Person 2 (DNATable.ID2) and the Most Recent Common Ancestor (DNATable.CommonAnc). Relate1 and Relate2, taken together with DNATable.CommonAncType, calculate the relationship between the shared DNA Match.

CommonAnc.description: Most Recent Common Ancestor (MRCA) of Person1 and Person2 of the DNA Match. Link to Primary Key of table based on DNATable.CommonAncType:  0 = PersonTable.PersonID, 1 = FamilyTable.FamilyID  Note: CommonAnc = 0 when both Relate1 and Relate2 = 0 (ie when no RM-defined Tree Relationship has been identified).

CommonAncType.description: Common Ancestor Type. When DNATable.CommonAnc > 0:  0 = Single MRCA (ie Half Relationship) identified in RM Tree, 1 = Couple MRCA identified in RM Tree  Note: CommonAncType also = 0 when DNATable.CommonAnc=0 (ie when no RM-defined Tree Relationship has been identified).

Note.description: DNA Note, from the DNA Match view of Edit Person Window.   User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags.

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5

OwnerID.description: Links to PersonID in the PersonTable

Condition.description: Condition, from the Health Condition view of the Edit Person window: 1= Infectious and parasitic disease, 2 = Respiratory diseases, 3 = Reproductive health and childbirth, 4 = Nutritional deficiency, 5 = Cancer, 6 = Endocrine, blood, and immune disorders, 7 = Diabetes, 8 = Mental health, 9 = Neurological, 10 = Eye condition, 11 = Ear condition, 12 = Cardiovascular, 13 = Digestive diseases, 14 = Renal and Urogenital, 15 = Skin disease, 16 = Musculoskeletal diseases, 17 = Congenital anomalies, 18 = Oral disease, 19 = Sexual health, 20 = Injuries and accidents, 999 = Other

SubCondition.description: Details, from the Health Condition view of the Edit Person window.

examples: Position coded string or free text

Note.description: Health Note, from the Health Condition view of the Edit Person window. User Interface supports line breaks and formatting tags

UTCModDate.description: Coordinated Universal Time from system, modified:  SELECT julianday('now') - 2415018.5
